row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_ENVIRONMENT@WINDOWS
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AMAZON.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_COMMON_OPTIONS
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! :SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = '' :IF &UC4RB_AWS_EGRESS_RULE# = 'YES' : SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '--egress ') :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '-P &UC4RB_AWS_PROTOCOL# ')
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_PORT_RANGE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '-p "&UC4RB_AWS_PORT_RANGE#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_ICMP_TYPE# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '-t "&UC4RB_AWS_ICMP_TYPE#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_SRC_DST_GRP_OWNER# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '-u "&UC4RB_AWS_SRC_DST_GRP_OWNER#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_SRC_DST_GRP# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '-o "&UC4RB_AWS_SRC_DST_GRP#" ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_CIDR# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#, '-s "&UC4RB_AWS_CIDR#" ') :ENDIF
Write-Host Removing the rule from security group &UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GRP#..
$output = java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" arb -cmd execute $env:EC2_HOME\bin\ec2-revoke.cmd &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# "&UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_GRP#" &UC4RB_REVOKE_OPTION#
$result = $output | select-string -pattern ^PERMISSION -caseSensitive
[string]::join("`n", $output)
if (![bool]($result)) { Write-Host Failed to revoke rule from security group exit 1 }
Write-Host "`nSuccessfully revoke rule"
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process:
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "GROUP*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1) : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 6, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 7) : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_OUT_GROUP_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&output_line#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_GROUP_NAME#, , 'WORKFLOW' : PRINT Group name (for EC2) or ID (for VPC) = &UC4RB_OUT_GROUP_NAME# :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
:SET &output_entry# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(, , "REP", "PERMISSION*") :PROCESS &output_entry# : SET &output_line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&output_entry#, 1)
! Extract the delimiter character from this output_line, usually the tab character : SET &tab# = STR_CUT(&output_line#, 11, 1) : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, 12)
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_RULE_TYPE# = 'ALLOWS' : SET &index# = STR_FIND(&output_line#, &UC4RB_OUT_RULE_TYPE#) : SET &index# = &index# + 7 : SET &output_line# = SUBSTR(&output_line#, &index#) : SET &output_line# = STR_SUB(&output_line#, &tab#, " ") : DEFINE &results#, string, 9 : FILL &results#[] = STR_SPLIT(&output_line#, " ") : SET &len# = LENGTH(&results#[], SIZE)
: SET &UC4RB_OUT_PROTOCOL_REVOKE# = &results#[1] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_PORT_RANGE_START# = &results#[2] : SET &UC4RB_OUT_PORT_RANGE_END# = &results#[3]
: IF &results#[5] = "USER" : IF &len# = 9 : SET &UC4RB_OUT_SOURCE_OR_DEST# = &results#[6] : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_OUT_SOURCE_OR_DEST# = &results#[7] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_OUT_SOURCE_OR_DEST# = &results#[6] : ENDIF
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_RULE_TYPE#, ,'WORKFLOW' : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_PROTOCOL_REVOKE#, ,'WORKFLOW' : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_PORT_RANGE_START#, ,'WORKFLOW' : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_PORT_RANGE_END#, ,'WORKFLOW' : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OUT_SOURCE_OR_DEST#, , 'WORKFLOW'
: PRINT The type of rule = &UC4RB_OUT_RULE_TYPE# : PRINT The protocol to allow = &UC4RB_OUT_PROTOCOL_REVOKE# : PRINT The start of port range = &UC4RB_OUT_PORT_RANGE_START# : PRINT The end of port range = &UC4RB_OUT_PORT_RANGE_END# : PRINT The source/destination = &UC4RB_OUT_SOURCE_OR_DEST#
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &output_entry#
